name: 4 Ingredient Homemade Egg Noodles

instructions.en: Whisk the eggs and egg yolks until light and fluffy.
instructions.sk: Šľahajte vajcia a žĺtky, kým nie sú svetlé a nadýchané.
instructions.ja: 卵と卵黄を軽くふわふわになるまで泡立てます。

instructions.en: Add the water, salt, and flour. Mix until a dough forms.
instructions.sk: Pridajte vodu, soľ a múku. Miešajte, kým sa nevytvorí cesto.
instructions.ja: 水、塩、小麦粉を加え、生地ができるまで混ぜます。

instructions.en: Knead the dough on a floured surface until smooth.
instructions.sk: Hnetite cesto na pomúčenom povrchu, kým nie je hladké.
instructions.ja: 粉を振った表面で生地を滑らかになるまでこねます。

instructions.en: Roll out the dough to about 1/8 inches thick. Cut into strips as thin or as wide as you want.
instructions.sk: Cesto rozvaľkajte na hrúbku asi 1/8 palca. Nakrájajte na prúžky podľa želania.
instructions.ja: 生地を約1/8インチの厚さに伸ばし、好みの太さに切ります。

instructions.en: To cook the noodles, drop them into boiling, salted water and cook for 7 to 9 minutes. Drain and use as desired.
instructions.sk: Na varenie rezancov ich vložte do vriacej, osolenej vody a varte 7 až 9 minút. Sceďte a použite podľa želania.
instructions.ja: 麺を沸騰した塩水に入れ、7〜9分間茹でます。水を切り、お好みで使用します。

notes: Use these egg noodles in your favorite recipes. Use gluten-free flour for gluten-free egg noodles. Store the uncooked egg noodles in the refrigerator for two to three days or in the freezer for up to two months.
